name: DeepMine
description:
The titanium mines of mars are crucial for the economic stability and survival of her colonies. Reports suggest an explosion has caused the DeepMine security mainframe to go haywire. It will take great strength to shut down the chaotic robots and set things straight again. Do you have the courage to take on the depths of DeepMine?

DeepMine is inspired by old-school metroidvanias, in particular Metroid II on the Game Boy. 

Controls:

A: Jump

B: Shoot

Select: Switch weapons (between lazer shot and missile)

Start: Save game when standing on a save podium.
